Banner.Description: I have 14 months of experience Developed the user interface using Angular, and technological solutions to make the web a better place. I am dedicated to writing and refactoring clean, reusable, and scalable code in Angular and sometimes in ASP.NET Core applying good practices and development standards.
AboutMe.Title: About me
AboutMe.Paragraphs: Dedicated and results-driven professional with a Master's in Computer Science and a solid foundation from a Bachelor's in Computer Science
Bringing 14 months of hands-on experience as a Solution. Developer with proficiency in a wide array of technologies
Demonstrated expertise in both front-end and back-end development, with a keen eye for detail and a commitment to delivering high-quality solutions
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include (but are not limited to):
Experience.Title: Experience

Experience.Jobs.Title: Fullstack developer
Description: Developed the user interface using Angular , ensuring an intuitive and seamless user experience.Played a key role in developing the back-end infrastructure using ASP.NET Core, ensuring robust and scalable functionality.
Conducted comprehensive unit tests to ensure the reliability and stability of the developed features.

Utilized a diverse technology stack including MySQL for database management, JavaScript,TypeScript, Angular, jQuery for front-end development, and C#, HTML, CSS, ASP.NET Core for the overall application architecture.
Successfully streamlined project management, time tracking, and invoicing processes for SMEs.
Implemented customizable dashboards and reports, providing users with valuable insights into their business performance.

FeatureProjects.Title: My projects
FeatureProjects.Label: Featured Project

FeatureProjects.Projects.Title: Enconsys
FeatureProjects.Projects.Description: Econsys is a cloud-based business management software designed to streamline operations for small and medium-sized enterprises (SMEs). Key features include project management, time tracking,invoicing, expense management, and customizable dashboards. Integration capabilities with popular     accounting software enhance financial management

OtherProjects.Title: More projects

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: Driving School App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: A web application designed to facilitate driving school management tasks.

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: K-Restaurants-App
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: An application dedicated to showcasing information and services of a single restaurant

OtherProjects.Projects.Title: CustHub
OtherProjects.Projects.Description: CustHub is a comprehensive customer management application designed for seamless CRUD operations. It provides a centralized hub for viewing, editing, and managing customer data with intuitive user interfaces. The app offers a streamlined experience with features like nested dialogs for detailed customer insights and flexible address management. With CustHub, businesses can efficiently organize and update customer information, enhancing productivity and customer service excellence.

Contact.Title: Get in touch!
Contact.Content: I will be happy to receive your contact if you want to talk about new opportunities. Write me, and I will reply as soon as I see your message. Simple one-page design that features a profile letter with basic information about a person.
